text: Ne lekha balia abakhola idini yabu okhuba emibayo nende eshindu shibulamwo oluchendo, ne obulamu bwokhushialo nibubakatia. Kho betsulisie mbu omwoyo kuletsa okhusishibwa khukakwakhola. Omwoyo shikuliba nende omulindi nohomba ukusabila obulesheli tawe, imbeli wa Nyasaye, ne kata nikurunga shiosishiosi shiyela shirie shikulichamilwa tawe. Abo nibo basishibwa shichila akabakhola. Abo balinyoola eshinywebwa shia amatsi kayile paa nende eshinyasio shiwumisinjia, shichila okhuyingana khwabu
